name: R Line After Dark (Miles Logan)
description:
A chill rhythm game with public transit theming.

There are 3 different modes and 3 different tracks to play, and the game keeps track of high scores throughout multiple play sessions, so you can keep coming back to try and improve.

Controls (switch between configs in the settings menu):

Pick Up
Drop Off
Drop Off Express
PrimaryZZ + X
Z + Arrow Keys
SecondarySpaceSpace + Return
Space + WASD

Known Bugs

  • Train rotates in place for a short while after song loads in
  • It takes longer than expected to go to the score screen after playing through a song
  • J Line song has one passenger that appears at the wrong station

Created by Miles Rosenthal and Eric Luo
